name: HeartLink (Utsawb)
description:
Use A and D to move, SPACE for ability (jump or climb), and Q to change character.

Heartlink tells the story of two robots that share a heart but have been separated by time after the laboratory they were created in was abandoned. Unable to exist without each other, you must transfer the heart between the two robots so they can escape the lab and be together once again.

Play as two robots that transfer a “heart” between them, unlocking movement abilities for the selected character and allowing them to progress. Solve puzzles and escape the lab to reunite.

Pixel assets: Rhiannon Duba, Wayne Page

Programmers: Thomas Ducote, Utsawb Lamichhane

Sound assets from:

https://www.youtube.com/@Pixverses

https://freesound.org/people/Jerimee/sounds/527526/
